title: S rank
body: RIOT EXPALIN HOW I GO 17/9/8, AS {{champion:59}}  right, 393 CREEPS 2nd HIGHEST DAMAGE IN GAME, 2ND MOST GOLD, AND I GET AN A, NOT A A+, AN A. AND I WENT BOT LANE WITH A HEIM AND A ZIGGS, i dont know how this ranking system works but bot lane jarvan, i have never seen, and especially ones that go positive where is my S rank chest, i just want a chance at championship {{champion:102}} , rito explain what i did wrong pls

replies.body: Champion mastery isn't graded on a flat set of numbers. It's a percentage based system showing you where you rank among all the players using that specific champ in the role you played. Getting a S+ means you placed in the highest percentage while getting an A just means there were players who performed better with Jarvan in bot lane.

The rank you get on a champion is actually based on the community average KDA for that champion in a certain time period. So your KDA is being ranked on a server scoreboard. I believe. Check out this post: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/gLZ8wJVo-how-is-your-grade-decided

Your KDA isn't the only thing being looked at. You have that, overall kill participation, cs, vision score, and the role which you were playing. A mid Annie would be graded different than a bot support Annie. They don't share the exact details of how the score is calculated, because they don't want people to adjust how they play in assumption of getting a higher chance of obtaining that S rank. If someone obtained 393 cs, that probably means this was an extremely long game. The duration of a game could also have an effect on the grading scale.
